title: 食用菇類重金屬限量標準
title_en: Sanitation Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Mushrooms
short_name: Sanitation Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Mushrooms
description: Official legislation text from Taiwan Laws & Regulations Database. Category: 廢止法規＞衛生福利部. Articles extracted: 4.

provisions.title: 第 1 條
provisions.content: 本標準依食品衛生管理法第十七條規定訂定之。

provisions.title: 第 2 條
provisions.content: 本標準適用食用菇類之子實體，不適用其菌絲體。
